meaningMnemonic: This is the adjective form of 汚, which is <kanji>dirty</kanji>. This word is the adjective <vocabulary>dirty</vocabulary>, but you can also use it to say things like <vocabulary>filthy</vocabulary>, <vocabulary>foul</vocabulary>, or <vocabulary>unclean</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: The reading is different from the other kun'yomi readings you've learned so far with this word. It is きたない. Think of it like you're saying "<reading>来た、な</reading>", as in "it came, huh?" What came? A really dirty looking monster, and it's coming for you.
